column1: Art Institute of Chicago////I am not "art smart" by any stretch
column2: but I did take 2 semesters of art history in college because the teacher was really good looking
column4: but in-between awkward staring sessions I did manager to learn a bit about the visual arts in a functional/historical context. Consequently my favorite sections are the Armory (swords and guns baby!)
column5: European Decorative Arts (ceramics and glassware for oldtimey rich people!)
column6: and the Ancient and Byzantine (highly ornate combs and nose rings galore!).
